h1. Vendors

The Vendors screen provides access to vendor definitions

* "Create or Modifying a Vendor":PLUGINS_ROOT/com.netxforge.netxstudio.help/html/tasks/library/vendors/creating_a_vendor.html


The Vendors screen


!PLUGINS_ROOT/com.netxforge.netxstudio.help/img/tasks/library/vendors/vendors.png!

*New* => Click on the upright link to create a new vendor
*Edit* => Right-click on a vendor in the table and select edit. 
*Filter* => Type text to filter vendors containing the text
